question: So Hongan, the question I would like you to do is, can you describe an event you attended recently?
transcript: Okay. Thank you. Okay, Ms. Hongan, when you are ready, please start. Yes there are many events I attend recently but if I have to pick one it could be my birthday It was on 25th February I remember there were some stunning friends come to my house and celebrate with me we had a lot of fun and we play games we ate my watering food and we sang karaoke together after that my friends gave me a cake and say happy birthday to me We laughed a lot and took photos together. Then my husband gave me a special gift. It was a diamond ring. I was really over the moon. It was a special birthday that I enjoyed with the people I loved the most in the world. in the future I will always celebrate with my wonderful family and my cute friends. Thank you very much. Well done. Thank you. I really enjoyed listening to that. And your birthday is on the 25th of February and mine's on the 22nd. Yeah. Amazing. Well.
